scripts.build: yarn build:tools && yarn build:front && yarn build:back
scripts.build:back: rm -rf dist/back_ dist/back dist/common && tsc -p tsconfig.back.json && mv dist/back dist/back_ && mv dist/back_/src/back dist/back && mv dist/back_/src/common dist/common && rm -rf dist/back_
scripts.serve:front: echo 'Remember to run `yarn build:tools` before running the frontend'; vite
scripts.serve:back: echo 'Remember to run `yarn build` and `yarn serve:front` before running the backend'; electron dist/back/
